title: Board level is stuck on 4 while I am on level 7 ..
body:
My board level is 4 while my in-game level is 7. Because it is 4 I cant post or upvote other posts.

I read about this problem in the forums and the solutions was to post a comment and it should refresh the board level tried it and it didn't work .... don't know what else I can do ..... pls help

replies.body: I booped your account for an update, and everything looks okay!  Now that you're sync'd you should be able to post without issues.  Let me know if you do though!
